title: MoparMiningLLC

created_time: September 13, 2023, 06:40:09 PMLast edit: August 03, 2024, 01:50:13 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: I have been in contact with the creator of this coin and he has opened up a group buy opportunity for me to share here. They are a collector of precious metals and of Bitcoin/Litecoin. They are hosting the Silver Symposium at the end of this month in Las Vegashttps://thesilversymposium.com/Their vision is " To bridge the gap between traditional precious metal enthusiasts and the avant-garde of the crypto and blockchain world."The coins are currently sold in rolls of 10 for $1,335 ea and next week the rolls will no longer be sold and the coins will be sold for $150 ea via their site. https://satpulsecoin.com/The coins thru this group buy are $135 ea vs the $150 ea they will be listed for on the site. COIN DETAILS:1/2 oz silverloaded with 1k Bits or 100,000 sats or .001 BTC1,000 mintedPAYMENT: Bitcoin only to address: bc1qz68vrhcjdxcejkj9nya0q6t0xx5afhg4yq7rzaSHIPPING OPTIONS:1. I ship to you direct - at cost - contact me first to provide address so I can add shipping costs to the total2. I HODL for consolidation with any future items - no shipping cost at this time3. I give to minerjones for consolidation - no shipping cost at this time to me (you will need to settle with minerjones when he ships to you)
